name: PDFAction
desc: An action that is performed when, for example, a PDF annotation is activated or an outline item is clicked.

items.name: class PDFActionGoTo
items.desc: PDFActionGoTo, a subclass of PDFAction, defines methods for getting and setting the destination of a go-to action.

items.name: class PDFActionNamed
items.desc: PDFActionNamed defines methods used to work with actions in PDF documents, some of which are named in the Adobe PDF Specification.

items.name: class PDFActionRemoteGoTo
items.desc: PDFActionRemoteGoTo, a subclass of PDFAction, defines methods for getting and setting the destination of a go-to action that targets another document.

items.name: class PDFActionResetForm
items.desc: PDFActionResetForm, a subclass of PDFAction, defines methods for getting and clearing fields in a PDF form.

items.name: class PDFActionURL
items.desc: PDFActionURL, a subclass of PDFAction, defines methods for getting and setting the URL associated with a URL action.

items.name: var type: String
items.desc: Returns the type of the action.
